subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Quick takeaways from the World Cup draw, including a look at a potential early collision of title contenders, a set of brothers who will represent different nations, England’s worries and Mexico’s luck.
